text:
Zillow Group / HotPads | Software Engineers, Dev Manager | San Francisco | Full Time | On site only

We're hiring all sorts of product-oriented software engineers (with >=2 years of experience) and senior software engineers: front end (node/react), back end (Java), and full stack to build the present and future of rental housing search. We're also hiring an ambitious hands-on full stack engineering manager who is an expert in one or both of Java and React, and proficient in the other.

Contact me at davidpe@zillowgroup.com
